intro: Boerhavia linearifolia, commonly known as slender马刺草, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It is characterized by its slender, linear leaves and small, pink or white flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant typically grows in moist, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun to partial shade. It is often found in disturbed habitats such as roadsides and open woodlands. Boerhavia linearifolia is also known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine for various ailments.
